name: Waves of Rotting Flesh
description:
Waves of Rotting Flesh is a stylized single player wave defense FPS. Defend a barricaded house against the hordes of the unliving, improve your abilities and weapons during the downtime between the enemy hordes, and try to survive until you can make a getaway.

The game features a selection of different weapons and enemies, various perks you can pick to improve your abilities, a regular play-mode and an endless mode. If you just want to kill some zombies for a few minutes, then this is the game for you.
